SEARCH
Package JEST.controller

Class GUIController

java.lang.Object
JEST.controller.GUIController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameController
public class GUIController extends Object implements GameController
Graphical User Interface implementation using existing View classes. This implementation bridges the GameInterface with the MainWindow and its panels.

  • Nested Class Summary

    • askNewOrLoadGame

      public int askNewOrLoadGame()
      Ask the user to start a new game or load an existing one using the GUI. Shows the appropriate panel and waits for the user's response.
      Specified by:
      askNewOrLoadGame in interface GameController
      Returns:
      1 for new game, 2 for load game

    • askNumberOfPlayers

      public int askNumberOfPlayers()
      Ask for the number of players using the GUI. Waits for the user's response through the interface.
      Specified by:
      askNumberOfPlayers in interface GameController
      Returns:
      the number of players (3 or 4)

      Specified by:
      askStrategy in interface GameController
      Parameters:
      playerNumber - the player number
      Returns:

    • askMakeOffer

      public int askMakeOffer(Player player, String jest, Card c1, Card c2)
      Ask a player to make an offer using the GUI. Shows the make offer panel and waits for the player's choice.
      Specified by:
      askMakeOffer in interface GameController
      Parameters:
      player - the player making the offer
      jest - the player's current jest
      c1 - first card
      c2 - second card
      Returns:
      the index of the card to show face up (1 or 2)

    • askChooseOffer

      public int[] askChooseOffer(Player player, String jest, List<Player> availablePlayers)
      Ask a player to choose an offer using the GUI. Shows the choose offer panel and waits for the player's choice.
      Specified by:
      askChooseOffer in interface GameController
      Parameters:
      player - the player choosing
      jest - the player's current jest
      availablePlayers - the list of players with available offers
      Returns:
      an array with [playerIndex, cardChoice] where cardChoice is 1 for face-up, 2 for face-down

      Parameters:
      player - the player who received the card
      card - the card that was added

      Parameters:
